summary: A safe cracker claims he has lost his memory when two criminals come calling for their cut of the bank heist loot.
cast: Emraan Hashmi|Vidya Balan|Rajesh Sharma|Namit Das|Vikram Kochhar|Parvin Dabas|Amar Kaushik|Raj Kumar Gupta|Tarun Dudeja|Vishwanath Chatterjee|Helena Fonseca|Shashank Shende|Frank M. Ahearn|Sunil Vishrani|Mahabanoo Mody-Kotwal
keywords: robbery|reference to shahrukh khan|reference to salman khan|man in underwear|subway
title: Ghanchakkar
